changeSet.sql: IF EXISTS ( SELECT type_desc, type FROM sys.procedures WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE NAME = 'person_access_procedures' AND type = 'P' ) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.person_access_procedures

changeSet.author: sajad
changeSet.sql:
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.person_access_procedures AS -- person insert into person_access select distinct v.id, v.username from person_view v left join person_access a on ( v.id = a.id and v.username = a.username ) where a.id is null
delete a from person_view v right join person_access a on ( v.id = a.id and v.username = a.username ) where v.id is null
